other_tests.findings: Sheets of clear cells with moderate nuclear pleomorphism; inconspicuous nucleoli and abundant clear cytoplasm, diagnostic of clear-cell renal-cell carcinoma, Fuhrman grade 2.
Encapsulated tumor (2.4 cm in diameter) limited to the kidney.
Intense staining of glomerular basement membrane for IgG, C3, kappa, and lambda, with trace staining for IgM, IgA, and C1q, diagnostic of membranous nephropathy.
Both assays positive for circulating antibodies to PLA2R.
